root.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II â€“ Retribution
root.description: Dawn Of War II: Retribution offers a campaign for every race, including the Imperial Guard. The campaign takes place across different planets in Subsector Aurelia including the jungle world Typhon, the desert world Calderis, the arctic world Aurelia, the hive world Meridian, the derelict ship Judgement of Carrion and the dead world Cyrene.
